DOC.detailed_description: In Stage I Behavioral & Integrative Treatment Development ( R34 ) project , propose develop theory-based smoking cessation intervention ( call Persistence-targeted smoking cessation ; PTSC ) . PTSC include 8 weekly individual counseling session use nicotine lozenge 12 week . We test feasibility preliminary efficacy intervention ( i.e. , cigarette per day prolong abstinence ) . We hope develop feasible psychosocial treatment use later randomize control trial .
